revision.text:
Now this is getting a bit meta...
This page is for site maintenance only. If you're looking for information on SBGN, please go back to the [[Main_Page]].
== Website Todo List (in no particular order) ==
=== Check for broken links and orphan pages === Get a crawler to write a site map??
=== Revamp overall navigation === Shadow prototype due on November 5th 2012 DONE
=== Change site visuals === CSS, + icons so that they work on a light background. NB: requires direct access to the wiki's server, then show prototype within a month.
=== Link to SBGN bricks === ?
=== Map of the month === ?
=== Integrate LibSBGN website more gracefully ===
=== What's on section? === upcoming meetings, current surveys and elections, competition...
=== New navigation bar? ===
== Manual list of orphans ==
To review (delete, link to, archive?)
=== Orphaned images ===
A number of these were probably linked to from the mailing list or surveys...
